creditline: Gift of Shelly Errington from the collection of her brother, Trois E. Johnson, M.D., and given in his memory
department: Chinese, South and Southeast Asian Art
description: standing female figure holding a small book in her PL hand; trim on headscarf and garment is scalloped with circle border; tall base with scrolling leaves; medium brown; "14" on masking tape on back of base
title: Figure of Mary Magdalene
